metadata.name: Love of knowledge ~ animated oil painting
metadata.description:
My animated oil painting "Love of knowledge".
1/1 NFT

"Love of knowledge"
100 x 100 cm (39 x 39 inch)
Oil on canvas
2019

We’re reaching for new knowledge, like a butterfly reaching for fire. And it doesn’t matter to us what kind of knowledge it will be. 

We just remember what we have forgotten a long time ago, and we are regaining what we have always had. As a crazy miser, pulling all sorts of crap home, we collect lost knowledge, hoping to find the truth.
